entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning then becoming west 20 late this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
